attributes.action: give some protection against disappearances - provide some security of person for the 2 / 3 rds of the world's deaths that are unexplained
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Inadequate birth and deaths registration blights almost every aspect of large - scale programme management - it is impossible to budget in the Exchequer if managers don't know how many people provision of services is for ! From each according to their ability, to each according to their needs still underpins the Welfare state, but more sophisticated  agendas look to provide also more sophisticated, individualised care - based on case management - this should not ignore the communist bulk economies of scale en masse.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
